programme.desc: James Ritchie will take us to discover more about the Bidayuh. A documentary series that will touch on the aspects of Bidayuh culture, tradition, history and where this race fares in todays world.

programme.title: (L) Berita Wilayah TVS
programme.desc: Berita Wilayah TVS membawakan berita dari negeri-negeri di seluruh negara.

programme.title: Negeri Yang Hilang Di Sarawak Ep4
programme.desc: Datu Dr.Haji Sanib bin Haji Said yang menghabiskan sepanjang hayatnya mengabdi sebagai ilmuwan dan cendekiawan. Biografi beliau menjadi intipati utama dalam mencari negeri Melayu yang hilang di Sarawak.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Project Jukebox S2
programme.desc: A compilation of refreshed music video cover of classic Iban and Bidayuh songs from the 90s and early 2000s.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: (DL) Menarik Sepuluh
programme.desc: Menarik Sepuluh mengumpulkan 10 kisah unik dan menarik berlaku di mana sahaja

programme.title: (L) UTAMA 740
programme.desc: UTAMA 740 memaparkan berita terkini yang menyeluruh dan padat dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Dialog TVS Ep98
programme.desc: Dialog TVS merupakan program bual bicara yang membincangkan mengenai perkembangan terkini serta topik-topik tertentu bersama pemimpin, pakar, penganalisis dan pemain industri.

programme.title: Sukan TVS S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan, perbincangan dan topik hangat sukan tanah air

programme.title: Sarawak Angler Ep2
programme.desc: Program realiti memancing laut dalam di perairan Sarawak diadakan bagi menduga dan mencari spesies ikan hebat.Pemancing profesional dari Sarawak telah dipilih untuk bertanding dalam program realiti ini.

programme.title: Borneo Tech Heroes Ep2
programme.desc: Explore Borneo's digital revolution in this documentary series, showcasing innovative tech, thriving startups, and how theyre transforming communities and reshaping the islands socio-economic landscape in the 4.0 era.

programme.title: Sumandak Takes Borneo Ep12
programme.desc: Dewi Remaja 2022 winner Tracie and two friends explore Borneos beautyfood, history, culture, nature, and diversitywhile uplifting communities through local social enterprises in this inspiring travelogue.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Goblin Ep15
programme.desc: Kim Shin, an immortal goblin, goes to find a human bride to remove an invisible sword from his chest and end his life. One day, school student Ji Eun-Tak confesses to him that she is the chosen one.

programme.title: Changemakers Ep4
programme.desc: This 6 episode series delves into the journeys of Sarawakian changemakers who have made significant impacts in their communities and beyond.

programme.title: Bario Permata Di Pergunungan Ep6
programme.desc: Pengenalan kepada bario-tanah tinggi kelabit. Kedudukannya dalam peta sarawak. Kemudahan perjalanan darat dan udara. Panorama gunung-ganang, cuaca yang nyaman (bario disebut bariew) bermaksud angin.

programme.title: Misteri Kedai Gunting Ep13
programme.desc: Kisah misteri yang dihantar oleh individu yang pernah mengalami peristiwa seram dan diceritakan semula oleh pencerita di dalam sebuah kedai gunting.

programme.title: A Day With Champion Ep4
programme.desc: This documentary follows six Sarawakianathletes in various types of sports, all at different stages in their career, and the different challenges they face.

programme.title: Ninjao S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ninjao Season 2 follows a group of young explorers on a Sarawak-wide expedition, discovering unique flora and fauna, and showcasing their resilience and appreciation for the region's natural treasures.

programme.title: The Cloth Story Ep7
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang keunikan batik, tenun, songket, busana dari peradaban melayu diselitkan dengan sedikit sejarah serta asal usul penghasilan kain.

programme.title: Joran Borneo S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Masih mengekalkan konsep Majalah travelog, JORAN BORNEO 2 akan meneruskan ekspedisinya bagi menjejaki lubuk ikan-ikan idaman pemancing di pendalaman dan di hulu BORNEO yang bersempadan Kalimantan.

programme.title: Borneo Dive Ep7
programme.desc: Explore the unique dive sites of Sabah and Sarawak, which attract both local and international divers. The region offers a rich variety of marine life for recreational and avid divers to observe.

programme.title: Journey of The Bidayuh Ep3
programme.desc: James Ritchie will take us to discover more about the Bidayuh. A documentary series that will touch on the aspects of Bidayuh culture, tradition, history and where this race fares in todays world.

programme.title: Negeri Yang Hilang Di Sarawak Ep4
programme.desc: Datu Dr.Haji Sanib bin Haji Said yang menghabiskan sepanjang hayatnya mengabdi sebagai ilmuwan dan cendekiawan. Biografi beliau menjadi intipati utama dalam mencari negeri Melayu yang hilang di Sarawak.

programme.title: Zinx Ep7
programme.desc: Sekumpulan orang muda dari kampung yang miskin nekad mengumpul kos perubatan ketua kumpulan, Zack dengan menubuhkan cybertrooper ZINX.

programme.title: Heart At Work Ep4
programme.desc: Heart at work delves behind the scenes into the lives of ordinary Sarawakians striving for the extraordinary. Witness for yourself as they recount their journey to success in their field of work.

programme.title: Kasut Ku Kusut
programme.desc: Kasut Ku Kusut mengisahkan seorang pemuda kampung bernama Manap yang berasa kecewa kerana kasut barunya telah hilang. Sementara itu, Markos, ahli kumpulan gangster Father Dragon, ditugaskan untuk membawa Suzi kepada ketua geng. Dalam perjalanan, mereka tersesat di sebuah kampung, dan Suzi berjaya melarikan diri lalu bertemu dengan Manap yang masih mencari kasutnya. Ketika Markos menemui mereka, Manap menyedari bahawa kasut yang dipakai oleh Markos kelihatan sangat mirip dengan kasutnya yang hilang.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit Sawadikap
programme.desc: mengisahkan Adnan (Shaheizy Sam) yang lucu, bersama isteri dan anaknya, memulakan perjalanan ke Thailand bersama sahabat baik mereka, Bobby dan Wawa, di mana pelbagai lagi pengembaraan menanti.

programme.title: Balada Pencinta
programme.desc: Sebuah kisah cinta terlarang antara Amir, bekas ahli mafia, dan Aisyah, seorang pelajar seni. Amir ingin memulakan hidup baru sebagai pemuzik jalanan, dan pada suatu hari, dia bertemu dengan Aisyah yang juga berasal dari keluarga kaya.

programme.title: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka
programme.desc: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka mengisahkan sekumpulan penunggang motosikal yang kasar berhenti di tepi jalan, dan tidak lama kemudian, kesemua merekakecuali Bobjatuh sakit secara misteri.

programme.title: Main Wayang Ep37
programme.desc: Program temu bual santai bersama peminat dan penggiat filem tempatan yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi tetamu berkaitan filem Abang Adik

programme.title: Istanbul Aku Datang
programme.desc: Seorang gadis muda dari Malaysia pergi ke Istanbul untuk bertemu dengan teman lelaki kesayangannya, namun gadis yang naif itu tidak tahu apa yang akan berlaku kepada kehidupannya di sana.

programme.title: Taikun
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua lelaki bernama Tai dan Kun, sahabat baik yang hanya meminati pergaduhan dan mencuri. Apabila tabiat buruk mereka menyebabkan mereka bertembung dan memukul teruk ahli geng Pink dan Purple, Tai dan Kun kemudian direkrut oleh ketua geng yang kagum dengan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Hantu Dalam Botol Kicap
programme.desc: Tiga kanak-kanak yang jahil melanggar peraturan di rumah nenek mereka, menyebabkan neraka terlepas bebas.

programme.title: Geran
programme.desc: Ali dan Fatimah berasa kecewa dengan adik mereka, Mat Arip, apabila dia gagal pulang dengan geran tanah pusaka mereka. Ali perlu mencari Mat Arip, yang telah bergaul dengan kumpulan yang salah dan terlibat dalam perjudian serta perlumbaan haram, lalu membawanya pulang kepada bapa mereka, Pak Nayan.

programme.title: Mamak Cupcake
programme.desc: MJ ialah seorang keturunan mamak kelahiran Pulau Pinang yang bersemangat dalam membuat kek cawan. Namun, bapanya menghalang kemajuannya kerana mahu MJ mewarisi perniagaannya.

programme.title: Nada Siar Ep37
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang menyajikan kepada anda klip-klip video soundtrack yang terkandung dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan.

programme.title: Sejoli
programme.desc: Jo (Bront Palarae) dan Gina (Maya Karin) sedang menyembuhkan hati yang terluka di Phuket apabila takdir mempertemukan mereka. Pada mulanya mereka saling membenci, tetapi apabila mereka mendapat tahu bahawa bekas kekasih masing-masing, Hardy (Remy Ishak) dan Nita (Izara Aishah), akan berkahwin, mereka merancang untuk menggagalkan majlis perkahwinan tersebut.

programme.title: 1 Lawan Satu
programme.desc: Saleh dan Radhi, dua 'pejuang' yang datang dari latar belakang berbeza, namun bertemu di gelanggang pertarungan. Saleh dibesarkan dengan kemahiran seni mempertahankan diri dan kini sedang mencari adiknya yang telah hilang. Radhi pula bertarung demi menyelamatkan adik perempuannya, Sara, yang sedang sakit tenat dan memerlukan RM50,000 untuk rawatan.

programme.title: Longkai
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang geng 'longkai' (tonto atau penunda kereta). Eddie dan Bada ialah adik-beradik longkai yang terkenal. Semua kenderaan yang ditunda oleh mereka akan dibawa ke bengkel Rimau. Walaupun dia seorang wanita, Rimau berperwatakan sedikit tomboy dan lasak. Rimau telah jatuh cinta dengan Bada, tetapi dia tidak pernah berani untuk meluahkan perasaannya walaupun dia nampak tough.

programme.title: Ruang Temu Ep37
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Erma Fatima yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan filem-filem yang diterajuinya.

programme.title: Balada Pencinta

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih
programme.desc: Azzam (Kholidi Asadil Alam), seorang pelajar Indonesia di Kaherah, bergelut untuk meneruskan kehidupan harian sambil belajar dan bekerja. Hidupnya yang sederhana mula berubah secara mendadak selepas pertemuan dengan dua orang wanita yang menarik perhatiannya.

programme.title: Konser Raya 3 Dekade Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama Ep1
programme.desc: Konser Raya 3 Dekade Indosiar Luar Biasa, meraikan ulang tahun ke-30 Indosiar Luar Biasa! 3 malam penuh kemeriahan bersama lebih daripada 300 artis hebat dan dihoskan oleh Idola Indonesia.

programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep13
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.title: Mas Mawar Adalah Maut
programme.desc: Tama, seorang penjual bunga, terpaksa melupakan impiannya untuk menjadi doktor selepas keluarganya muflis dan ibu bapanya meninggal dunia. Sheina, seorang doktor, mengalami kemalangan akibat kemurungan selepas mengetahui tunangnya berlaku curang. Dia hilang ingatan dan dijaga oleh Tama. Tanpa mereka sedari, takdir sudah merencanakan sesuatu yang indah untuk mereka.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep11
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep98
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Jatim Traveler Ep20
programme.desc: Jatim Traveler membawa anda mengembara menerokai keunikan kulinari, keindahan destinasi pelancongan, dan tradisi istimewa di serata pelosok Jawa Timur.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep266
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Balas Dendam Berbalas Cinta
programme.desc: Shinta perlu membalas dendam dengan Pak Wisnu, musuh bapanya. Disebabkan dendam itu, Shinta terus mengalami mimpi buruk setiap hari. Tanpa disangka, Shinta diterima untuk menjadi pembantu pengurus bagi anak Pak Wisnu, iaitu Rama. Akhirnya, Shinta mendapat peluang untuk membalas dendam!

programme.title: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa Ep31
programme.desc: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa adalah sebuah rancangan yang menilai kejadian atau peristiwa dari perspektif Islam, mengungkap hikmah di sebalik dosa.

programme.title: Suster El Ep34
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep98
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Balas Dendam Berbalas Cinta

Tanpa disangka, Shinta diterima untuk menjadi pembantu pengurus bagi anak Pak Wisnu, iaitu Rama. Akhirnya, Shinta mendapat peluang untuk membalas dendam!

programme.title: Lara Ati Ep18
programme.desc: Cerita ini berkisar tentang empat orang lelaki yang hadir untuk satu sama lain dan saling membantu menghadapi sakit hati (lara ati) yang mereka alami dalam kehidupan masing-masing.

programme.title: Balas Dendam Berbalas Cinta

programme.title: Balas Dendam Berbalas Cinta
programme.desc: Shinta perlu membalas dendam dengan Pak Wisnu, musuh bapanya. Disebabkan dendam itu, Shinta terus mengalami mimpi buruk setiap hari. Tanpa disangka, Shinta diterima untuk menjadi pembantu pengurus bagi anak Pak Wisnu, iaitu Rama. Akhirnya, Shinta mendapat peluang untuk membalas dendam!

programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. programme.title: The Attorney

programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: Gyeong-Ah's Daughter
programme.desc: After her husband passed away, Gyeong-ah relies on her daughter Yeon-su. But they barely meet each other. One day, Gyeong-ah gets an anonymous message about Yeon-su and goes into trauma...

programme.desc: Based on the historical Battle of Noryang in 1598. A story of Yi Sun-Shin's last battle during the Japanese invasions of Korea.

programme.desc: A woman planned revenge against her teacher after being wrongfully imprisoned for 13 years.

programme.title: The Ways of Tasting Ep4
programme.desc: A special program showcasing actresses Lee Ji-ah and Kim Go-eun's trip to famous restaurants and bars in Seoul and Taiwan, pairing whiskey with food.

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent: Norway Ep2
programme.desc: Yoo Hae-jin, Jin Seon-kyu, Yoon Kyun-sang ,and Park Ji-hwan reunited for a new journey, this time on a Winter camp in Norway, to fulfill their life dream of sighting the Northern Lights.

programme.title: Walking Through The Village Ep5
programme.desc: Actor Gu Bon-seung shows the warmth and purity of life in the village along the river, and presents how new history was made and became ones memory.

programme.title: The Genius Paik Ep11
programme.desc: Will Paik Jong-won be able to successfully run a restaurant overseas? With the help of Lee Jang-woo, BamBam, Yuri and John Park, he will start his business in the barren land of K-food Africa and Italy.

programme.title: Second Shot at Love Ep3
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.title: Second Shot at Love Ep4
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea 2 Ep5
programme.desc: <Fresh off the Sea> returns with Season 2! Lim Ji-yeon and Lee Jae-wook join the crew to hit Korea's coast and explore local delicacies unique to the area.

programme.title: Super Brain Season 12 Ep5
programme.desc: Jiang Changjian hosts a large-scale brainpower reality program in China with the slogan "Win Together as Provinces". You Jianing, Pang Bo, and Wei Kunlin are the team leaders, while Zhu Dan and Huang Shengyi serve as cheerleaders. The program focuses on innovative thinking and teamwork for an intellectual battle.

programme.title: No. 17 Live House Season 3 (Repackaged) Ep2
programme.desc: Season 3 has a fresh format and exciting stage challenges.The hosts will sing without revealing their identities to attract audiences and get scores. Returning guests are Hu Xia, Pax Congo, and Curley Gao, along with new member Alan Deng. They will discover wonderful tunes in everyday life.

programme.title: People's Palate Ep4
programme.desc: This food documentary reality show features Nicholas Tse as the "Taste Explorer." He travels with guests to discover local cultures and beautiful landscapes, tasting various traditional dishes.

programme.title: Mars Agency Season 7 (Repackaged) Ep8
programme.desc: The show returns with a star-studded lineup including Joker Xue and Yang Di. This brain-teasing variety talk show explores trending memes and audience interests, featuring exciting challenges with prominent celebrities. Get ready for a fun showdown thats sure to entertain everyone!

programme.title: Talk To Your Boss Season 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Showing the working environment and overlapping sound between the employees and bosses, the program explores the dilemmas and problems encountered by people in the workplace today. A new session of guest observation room is added in Season 4 with the hosts, Huang Xiao Ya, and guests, Li Xiang, Gao Qing Yi, and Lai Mei Yun. Lets watch the stories in the workplace and share their experience and insight together.

programme.title: My Boyfriend Ep7
programme.desc: CEO Yi Ning enters a contractual marriage with Shen Qianze, unaware of his revenge motive against her family. Initially filled with hatred, Shen falls for Yi Ning while fighting to protect her company. After his uncle Su Jingxuan frames Yi Ning and seizes her business, Shen helps expose Sus crimes, restoring justice and renewing their relationship built on trust.

programme.title: Love Behind the Mask Ep16
programme.desc: The story follows Wen Yanshu and Mu Han, who meet and fall in love while hiding their actual identities. They protect their homes and strive for a better world together, finding comfort in each others past wounds and bravely facing their responsibilities and missions.

programme.title: Whisper’s dishes Season 4 Ep10
programme.desc: Gourmet food as the media of the new cultural interview program, each episode invited cultural celebrities, celebrity chefs, foreign handsome men, live network red and folk gourmets guests together to visit the meal, in tasting folk delicious at the same time, share the life story.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 3 Ep14
programme.desc: A dating program designed for singles or divorced people who have passed the age of marriage. 4 male guests and 3 female guests would join the one-to-one communication in sequence per episode. The guests who are under the stage would be arranged to a room, to communicate more and deepen their understanding with each other. Love never comes late!

programme.title: The Melody of You Season 2 (Live) Ep7

programme.title: Wei Jie Xiang Chou Ep8

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 6 (Repackaged) Ep7
programme.desc: The program has been refreshed and upgraded, departing from its initial structure. The topic of the show is "Listening to the Voice of the World, Singing With Legends." The musical extravaganza that will be created is full of infinite vitality and features over 30 singers, including Liu Yuning, Mao Buyi, Ma Jiaqi, Leo Ku, Hacken Lee, Tengger, and Gong Linna. The goal is to get back to the core of music and work together to produce fusion hits that will increase opportunities for collaboration and communication amongst the artists.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5089
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: The story is based on a 1993 true event, the "China-Russia Train Robbery" where a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman heads the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: A Legend
programme.desc: Archaeologist Professor Fang uncovers artifacts from a glacier expedition that resembles a jade pendant in his dream. To unveil the truth, Professor Fang leads his team to a journey into the glacier, embarking on a fantastical adventure together.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2013
programme.desc: Sung Chi Hung and Ha Shek Lam worked at a Chinese restaurant when they were young and both fell in love with the owners daughter, Yeung. Sung and Yeung eventually got married and took over the restaurant. Many years later, Sung meets Ha who is now a real estate tycoon and plans to buy out the restaurant. Can Sung save the restaurant?

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk and Chief Inspector Lau both hit a dead end when investigating their respective bribery and money laundering cases. When Luk is accused of bribery after being framed by the money launderers, he risks everything he has to find crucial evidence against them to clear his name.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his fathers martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hungs passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lus disciple.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxus enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Lady is the Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Martial Arts of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: House of Traps
programme.desc: An evil prince has hidden the stolen imperial treasures in a house filled with booby-trapped blades. Amid plasma-spurting attacks, heroes and rogues try to uncover the deadly secrets of the house...

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and guarded by top martial arts masters. Two powerful patriots need to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: One of the great Kung-fu film characters is Beggar Su, a legendary Ching Dynasty figure who was also a member of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers. Little-known director Liu Shih-yu uses the best Kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer to tell a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure, as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liangs work, but essentially an image to him as well.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Pursuit of a Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the walls?

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: Come Drink with Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar Drunken Cat who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kongs entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huangs father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: Hagola Ep7
programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Incredible Journeys with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In this third episode, Simon focuses on some of the incredible wildlife stories he's encountered.

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Steve returns home to the Atlantic waters of the British Isles as he considers the question of what humanity can do to ensure the enduring future of whales, which have already survived so much.

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Freshwater: Timing Is Everything - Freshwater is often the stage on which millions of animals gather to find a mate. And the cycle of freshwater is the trigger for spectacular mating rituals and fierce competition.

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Amazon with Robson Green S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Robson explores the stunningly beautiful Anavilhanas Archipelago in his canoe. An intricate pattern of tiny islands and lagoons, it's a truly magical place, teeming with fish and bird life.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep3
programme.desc: Oregon - Ben spends time with Pirate Rob, who lives for half the year with his 18-year-old son Damien in a sandbag house on an island in the middle of an industrial river in Oregon.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Cuba - Alongside Cuban fishermen Robson searches for sardines, tarpons, bonefish, barracudas and grouper fish.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lemurs of Anja Mountain - Millions of years ago, castaway creatures were stranded on the rugged shores of Madagascar. Left to evolve on their own, theyve found a way to perfectly adapt to their tropical climate. Now, see what life is like for a family of ring-tailed lemurs.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Bears Thanksgiving - Spy on the summer cubs as they learn to climb trees and forage for food in preparation for their release into the wild. Get surprised by a set of new arrivals, observe the annual pre-hibernation eating binge, and enjoy a bear-friendly Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Goodbye Campers - Prepare for the summer cubs release with Roger, then meet Ace and Little Blueberry, two newbies with serious health issues who will have to stay over the winter with the Z cubs. Later, celebrate as six healthy, happy bears embark on their new life.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Desert-Adapted Elephant - Trek across the Namibian desert with the bush elephant and learn how it keeps its cool in a place with little food or shade. Discover how this giant consumes specific plants, digs wells, and hikes endless dunes in a quest to find precious water.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Deadly Rivals - Enter the world of a wild dog pack whose bountiful hunting grounds are threatened when a clan of spotted hyenas moves in nearby. The vulnerable pups start to go hungry as the scavenging rivals steal their food and eventually raid their den.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Buffalo Showdown - To the lion, the buffalo is not only a satisfying dinner but also dangerous. Track a herd of 300 buffalo along with the Mwamba pride, who must act quickly and carefully if they are to take down their prey.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Chobe River - A mighty river snakes through wilderness in southern Africa. Its vast flood plains are a magnet for animals that, during the dry season, travel great distances to reach this oasis. But every animal has its place along the banks of the mighty Chobe.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Stripes of Serima - The vets have Zebras on their minds. The endangered and beautiful Grevys zebras have to be isolated to bel breed. On the other side of the reserve, the more common zebras are destroying the cattles grazing land and have to be moved.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep5

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep4
programme.desc: South America - Learn how South Americas rich diversity of weather fuels an even richer diversity of life. Examine the Amazon rainforests oxygen-breathing trees, follow the arc of a vast cloud river, and meet flamingos that thrive in the suns scorching UV rays.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Source to Sea - Follow a rivers epic quest to find the ocean, carrying water that has floated high over the mountains, quenched giant thirsts, and cut through rock, only to spill its nutrients into the warm and vibrant Indian Ocean and continue its endless cycle.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lemurs of Madagascar - The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries S3 Ep5
programme.desc: The Enemies Within - Vet Batian is leaving Ol Pejeta after six years and he's organizing his team for one last action: a massive translocation of three speciesabout 500 animals. But when things go wrong, the staff is forced to come up with plan B.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Islands - Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Heat - Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetland Wonder - South Africas greatest wetland, Lake St. Lucia, provides sustenance for animals that depend on standing water, including hippos, crocs, and countless water birds. But during a drought, the system faces challenges that have devastating consequences.

programme.title: Land of Primates S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wanderers of the Lost Forest - Hogsback, South Africa, is home to two fascinating primates: The Samango monkeys and the Cape Parrots. See how they overcome habit loss, travel across town for food, and make the most of a difficult situation.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 8 - On a visit to a dairy, Rick meets a man who is paid to eat 700 samples of cheese a week and cooks his sumptuous cheese and chive scones. His next stop is the salty old fishing town of Newlyn, the unlikely setting of one of Britain's most revolutionary art movements. Rick discovers an intriguing tale of deception behind one of the most famous paintings produced here.

programme.title: Jamie's 5 Ingredient Mediterranean Meals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: This time, Jamie's dressing a salad in a way you've never seen before... with a crown of cheese! He's got a speedy, tasty twist on your Sunday roast that keeps it all in one pan; and puts store-cupboard essentials centre stage in two fabulous family meals that are made in minutes. Finally, YouTube sensation Alex Anouz shares his fabulous 5-ingredient take on a French classic.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Invisible Hideaways - In Uruguay we venture deep within the rural countryside to an area of remote forests and lakes to a one hundred hectare resort of mirrored cabins. In Sweden we visit the Kolarbyn Eco Lodge - a rustic retreat of 12 hobbit like huts that are replicas of those built in this forest by people making charcoal from as far back as the 1800s.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2014
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2014 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep9
programme.desc: Home Alone - Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero but being brave quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who's There?/Tour Guide of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep17
programme.desc: Berry Race / The Artist - The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep21
programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep1
programme.desc: Everest Returns - Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yis violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yis music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep13
programme.desc: Free Scauldy - Hiccup, Toothless, and the dragon riders discover an injured Scauldron on the shores of Changewing Island. When the Scauldron takes a shine to Ruffnut, the kids see a chance to heal the dragon and return him safely to the ocean, before he falls victim to the elements, as well as the territorial Changewings.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep14
programme.desc: Frozen - During an ice storm, Speed Stingers infest Berk, driving the residents into hiding.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep15
programme.desc: Tale of Two Dragons - The gang must help the town ready for harvest but Hookfang and Stormfly are at each others throats.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.
