programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep43
programme.desc: Only The Lucky Survive / Shar-Squad - Tip tricks Oh into thinking he's invincible to convince him to go on a dangerous adventure/Sharzod takes revenge when she loses her squad to her arch-rival Fance

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep43
programme.desc: Desserted Island/Dry Spell - The crew gets stranded on a candy-filled mystery island; Burn isn't herself after a losing streak so the crew goes to extreme lengths to help her win.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep43
programme.desc: Bridge - A group of Trux displaced by a volcano comes to Ty for help, and the gang has to work together to build a bridge to welcome their new guests.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep43
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Squeaky - Raa Raa is in a particularly helpful mood and offers to help everyone take provisions for the picnic to Rockywockyville for them. But he doesn't arrive in time, everyone sets out to see what has happened to their noisy little lion friend

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep43
programme.desc: The Case Of The Flyaway Balloons - Everyone is decorating special balloons in Toyland. They're going to have a big Balloon Release at the end of the day and see how far they can fly. But when Noddy returns in the afternoon with Big Ears, the balloons have already flown away! Noddy decides to investigate. Following all the clues, he arrives at Deltoid's house. The action hero toy tells him that he only took back his specially decorated balloon. The others were still there earlier. Noddy works out that when Deltoid took his balloon, he retried the strings of the others with a knot that came undone. The balloons are flying away! Revs quickly converts to helicopter mode and Noddy is able to catch the balloons before they fly away for good. Back at Toy Green later, Deltoid is persuaded to release his balloon alongside the other balloons and this time the Balloon Release takes place without any problems at all. Well done Deltoid and well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep95
programme.desc: Mystery In Flowertot Garden - Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep18
programme.desc: Winkly Fest / Snow - When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep36
programme.desc: The Pangea-ing - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep12
programme.desc: The Flight Stuff - With Snotlouts fate unclear, Gustav tries to fill in for him at the Dragon Academy.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap to the Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As shes preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep11
programme.desc: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues - Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep23
programme.desc: New Hat, New Tag! / Furry Tail Ending - When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep24
programme.desc: Bigpaw, Big Problems / Captain Scooch and Scally-Tag - Tag, Scooch and Kit think they found the perfect story for their newspaper: Bigpaw is in Pawston! But when they find out that Frank and Beans were lying to the town, they seek to uncover the truth and reveal it to everyone. \ When Sam Whippet sets up a pirate-themed race for the Race Cadets, pirate-loving Scooch takes on the role of captain. Tag struggles to take orders as first mate while helping Scooch navigate maritime obstacles and avoid the fearsome pirates.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep19
programme.desc: Rodney the Hero / Club Shed - When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe hes a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesnt go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ians lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep10
programme.desc: Sword - Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girls plans to attend the Governors Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isnt interested

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep18
programme.desc: Winkly Fest / Snow - When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys to Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sams big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep22
programme.desc: That Stinking Feeling / Go for The Gold - When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founders Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep16
programme.desc: The Eel Effect - A dangerous flu is spreading throughout Berk and Toothless is its latest victim.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep17
programme.desc: Smoke Gets In Your Eyes - A rogue species of dragon terrorizes Berk by stealing all of the metal in town.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep18
programme.desc: Bing! Bang! Boom! - Three adolescent thunderdrums are wrecking havoc on Berk and only Thornado can control them.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep16
programme.desc: The Eel Effect - A dangerous flu is spreading throughout Berk and Toothless is its latest victim.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep17
programme.desc: Smoke Gets In Your Eyes - A rogue species of dragon terrorizes Berk by stealing all of the metal in town.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep18
programme.desc: Bing! Bang! Boom! - Three adolescent thunderdrums are wrecking havoc on Berk and only Thornado can control them.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep510

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S8 Ep801
programme.desc: The Pirate Grand Prix - It'sPegwheel the pirate'sfirst race-and who better to join him than Pirate Blaze! Can they beat Crusher to the trophy and prove they're the best racers on the seven seas, or will strong winds and high altitudes get the better of them?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast - It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out! // When Chickaletta gets trapped in a Corn Field Maze, the PAW Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone / Pups Save the Deer - With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of loose kittens back all by himself. But he has the help of the other pups' packs! // Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a family of deer stuck on slippery ice!

programme.desc: This Way, That Way - The Teletubbies go 'this way, that way' on a Tubby Car journey to the Hidey Hup. The Tubby Spinny goes 'this way, that way' too.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep18
programme.desc: R - Dee encourages a friend to say 'r', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We roar, dance like a robot and see a rainbow!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Zip Express - The friends board the Zip Express, a train that takes them across Pop Paper City. But when the friends face an unexpected challenge, it's unknown if the train will reach their destination on time.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Paperchase - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy has a pair of yummy green socks waiting for him. He eats one, but where is the second? He visits OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Tradies - Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Onesies - When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Chichen Itza, Mexico - Grandmaster Glitch's giant ball game threatens El Castillo in Chichen Itza, Mexico, so the Go Jetters attempt to save it.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep11
programme.desc: The Great Wall of China, China - Glitch and his grimbots have a long race on a very long wall - the Great Wall of China!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Bingo - When Bluey has a playdate at Chloe's, Bingo must learn how to play by herself. But all the games she knows need more than one person! Luckily Dad has a problem that needs solving.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Dropoff - Dad refuses to be late dropping off Bluey and Bingo at kindy and school, but the girls make Dad play so many games, they quickly derail his plan.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Ankylosaur & Club - Andy travels 70 million years back in time on a mission to replace a broken museum artefact and meets the armoured tank of the dinosaur world - Ankylosaur.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Mission: Toy Shop - Charli loses her phone at the toy shop. Can Tinks' super-fetch skills help her find it?

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Galapagos Tortoise and Giant African Land Snail - This episode features the Galapagos tortoise and the giant African land snail - their wild connection is they carry their homes with them.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep8
programme.desc: Captain's Log - Captain Captain entrusts Sandy and Seaweed with her treasured Captain's Log!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep38
programme.desc: The Dressing Up Badge - Norrie suggest a dressing up party to celebrate Enid's birthday.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - Duggee and the squirrels begin a trip to the lake, but get stuck in a traffic jam!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Water Badge - The squirrels learn all about where water comes from.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep37
programme.desc: Mars Mission, Chile - Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep4
programme.desc: Panicky Percy - Percy causes confusion for everyone and prompts delays, when he spends too much time panicking over nothing.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Rainbow's Niece - Sarah's new colour wheel reminds Rainbow that he has not seen his niece in a while.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Duck's Quack - Sarah suggests visiting the spare sounds section of the Big Shop when Duck loses his quack.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Moon - Stan helps his friends to get a closer look at the moon through a telescope, so they can do a show-and-tell.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Cake - Hattie needs help to bake a cake - and Stan's on his way! No challenge is too small or too unusual, and Stan's always happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep53
programme.desc: Take a Break - When Monty sees Violet enjoying doing absolutely nothing, he starts to wonder if it is a good thing to take a break and relax.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep5
programme.desc: It's time to find a butterfly - JoJo searches for a butterfly to complete her nature tick-book. She learns that all butterflies start life as furry little caterpillars.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The Duck Badge - The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep52
programme.desc: The Glasses Badge - When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help?

programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1802
programme.desc: Flyweight Contenders - The UFCs Womens Flyweight division has long been ruled by Valentina Shevchenko, but new contenders are on the rise. See Casey ONeill, Andrea Lee, Maycee Barber, and more fight their way toward the top of the 125-pound rankings.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC283TeixeiravsHill
programme.desc: At UFC 283, former champion Glover Teixiera and Jamahal Sweet Dreams Hill squared off for the vacant light heavyweight belt. See both men train and prepare ahead of their championship bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC308TopuriavsHolloway
programme.desc: UFC 308 Countdown previews the promotions return to Abu Dhabi, where featherweight king, Ilia El Matador Topuria, defends his title against Max Blessed Holloway. Plus, middleweights collide as Robert Whittaker takes on Khamzat Chimaev.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC307PereiravsRountreeJr
programme.desc: Two UFC title fights rock Salt Lake City as one of UFCs busiest and most dominant champions, Alex Pereira, puts his Light Heavyweight title on the line against fellow knockout artist Khalil Rountree Jr., and Raquel Pennington defends her Bantamweight belt for the first time against TUF rival and former champion Juliana Pea. Plus Jose Aldo returns to face Mario Bautista and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep10
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep27
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC307PereiravsRountreeJr
programme.desc: Two UFC title fights rock Salt Lake City as one of UFCs busiest and most dominant champions, Alex Pereira, puts his Light Heavyweight title on the line against fellow knockout artist Khalil Rountree Jr., and Raquel Pennington defends her Bantamweight belt for the first time against TUF rival and former champion Juliana Pea. Plus Jose Aldo returns to face Mario Bautista and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.desc: UFC 307 Countdown previews two title fights, as light heavyweight champion Alex Pereira looks to defend his belt against Khalil Rountree Jr, and bantamweight queen Raquel Pennington returns to face the divisions former title holder Julianna Pena.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Burns vs. Morales
programme.desc: Prelims - Perfect as a professional, Michael Morales is rapidly rising up the welterweight ladder, and on May 18, the 17-0 phenom will put his unbeaten record on the line when he faces his toughest test to date, perennial contender Gilbert Burns, in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Neil Magny, Ecuadors Morales now has his sights on Brazils Burns, a former world title challenger determined to score the win and get back in the championship chase at 170 pounds.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Burns vs. Morales
programme.desc: Main Event - Perfect as a professional, Michael Morales is rapidly rising up the welterweight ladder, and on May 18, the 17-0 phenom will put his unbeaten record on the line when he faces his toughest test to date, perennial contender Gilbert Burns, in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Neil Magny, Ecuadors Morales now has his sights on Brazils Burns, a former world title challenger determined to score the win and get back in the championship chase at 170 pounds.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC302MakhachevvsPoirier
programme.desc: UFC 302 Countdown previews the return of the number one pound-for-pound king, Islam Makhachev, as he defends his lightweight title against former interim champion, Dustin Poirier. Plus, middleweights collide as Sean Strickland battles Paulo Costa.

programme.title: UFC 315: Muhammad vs. Della Maddalena
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon returns to Montreal, Quebec, Canada for the first time since 2015, and on May 11, fans at the Bell Centre will be treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event of UFC 315, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena. Perfect in seven trips to the Octagon, including five post-fight bonus-winning efforts, Della Maddalena is determined to bring a title down under, but in Muhammad, he will be facing a fighter who is undefeated for over six years while beating the best of the best at 170 pounds. In the co-main event, Valentina Shevchenko begins her second reign atop the flyweight division when she tackles top French contender Manon Fiorot

Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep27
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC307PereiravsRountreeJr
programme.desc: Two UFC title fights rock Salt Lake City as one of UFCs busiest and most dominant champions, Alex Pereira, puts his Light Heavyweight title on the line against fellow knockout artist Khalil Rountree Jr., and Raquel Pennington defends her Bantamweight belt for the first time against TUF rival and former champion Juliana Pea. Plus Jose Aldo returns to face Mario Bautista and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1002
programme.desc: Ultimate Knockouts "Welterweights - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you a collection of the best welterweight KOs.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC308TopuriavsHolloway
programme.desc: UFC 308 Countdown previews the promotions return to Abu Dhabi, where featherweight king, Ilia El Matador Topuria, defends his title against Max Blessed Holloway. Plus, middleweights collide as Robert Whittaker takes on Khamzat Chimaev.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Burns vs. Morales
programme.desc: Prelims - Perfect as a professional, Michael Morales is rapidly rising up the welterweight ladder, and on May 18, the 17-0 phenom will put his unbeaten record on the line when he faces his toughest test to date, perennial contender Gilbert Burns, in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Neil Magny, Ecuadors Morales now has his sights on Brazils Burns, a former world title challenger determined to score the win and get back in the championship chase at 170 pounds.
